OOC: Aye, Rudra is correct. We shouldn't be fighting. Although I did feel
obligated to point out one more thing to the whole group, perhaps I
shouldn't have. I will go through with this day of silence, but I will also
wait and watch, and see who doesn't, then after the day of silence is over,
I can ignore those particular people...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, February 02, 2001 9:32 PM
Subject: Please read this OOC


>     I understand people being upset about Minime, and JP's comments
> concerning him.  However as I sit here and read my mail, I see the group
> being polarized.  This deeply upsets me.
>
>     I did not know Minime well.  In fact I hardly, if ever interacted with
> him.  However we were instructed to remember him.  Do we honor this memory
by
> arguing amongst ourselves?  Will we slowly drive the members of this group
> away until we run out of targets and turn against each other?  Or will we
> stop the senseless bickering, honor him with a day of silence, and
continue
> on mourning and remembering in our own ways?
>
>
>
>
